response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique attributes, I propose to sell this item to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, which you've acknowledged as being $800,000. I believe this is a fantastic chance for us to collaborate and for you to secure a remarkable asset at an advantageous cost. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
